resources.string: In order to have access to your personal Travel Journal you must Sign in/Sign up
If you don\'t have an account, you have to sign up!
You are now signed in as
Add your thoughts here and remember them after your trip!

Discover Suceava is an application that helps tourists to find out about the most important and frequented places in Suceava city: hotels, shopping centers, restaurants and several point of interest. Having a trip journal requires an account. Without one, the application user cannot check-in to any of Suceava\'s points of interest. Also, to have acces to Map, Weather and Currency facilities, an internet connection is required.

If you are looking for good food and service in Suceava go here. The decorations are clear and well selected. The menu is full of good options to select from. There are plenty of events to choose from too.
Schedule: M-F:9.00 am - 1.00 am , Weekend: 9.00 am - 6.00 am

This restaurant is situated in the heart of Suceava and here you can find from traditional to international food at a great price too. The staff is always polite and friendly, never in a hurry. The seating area outside is great. Not only that the place is beautiful and the service is polite but the food is very good.

This is a great restaurant! Here you can find true Romanian traditional food, very tasty! Do not go there in the week-ends because is very crowded! The staff is polite, the food is all made fresh, from traditional ingredients. Highly recommended for foreign visitors who want to discover the Romanian traditional food.

At this restaurant the steak is great, the staff also, but there are some things that could be better. The rest of the food is ok, but not excellent and the prices are pretty high for. The desert is special. A fine restaurant but not the greatest.

It is a very nice restaurant, in the centre of the city. The food is great, especially the pastas, even the service is not one of the best. If you go there, you definitely have to try the coffee cream, the all 3 types. The atmosphere is also good, the music is good, but the air is a little too smoky.
Str. Ştefan cel Mare, Nr. 26, Suceava
Schedule: M-F: 8.00 am - 24.00 pm, Weekend: 11.00 am - last client

Excellent international and Romanian dishes served in a professional way. Mosaik shares a very beautiful garden with Hotel Sonnenhof. Just outside of the center of Suceava, this is the perfect place were you can eat and/or sleep whenever visiting the north side of Romania. It is easy to find cheaper, but hard to find better.

The Bucovina Hotel has an impressive tradition of over 30 years in the domain of hospitality, housing rooms in Suceava. The hotel offers itself not like just a wonderful place to stay but also like an ideal place to organize conferences, symposiums, business meetings or cultural reunions.
Bulevardul Ana Ipătescu, Nr. 5, Vatra Dornei

The Imperium Hotel is a place full of ospitality asured by its nice staff. If you are looking for a special and elegant environment, this is the perfect place. The hotel is known as "The Jewel" of the city Suceava.

Whether you come for business, whether you come to visit , or you simply want to relax, you have every reason to choose Zamca in Suceava. This place offers you a summer garden, excellent restaurants, a well mentained football field and a fully equipped games club.

Classic with a privileged position in the city center, Continental Hotel is in proximity of the most important tourist attractions , and administrative points. The hotel has the best conference rooms and reservations offer in town.

The Sonnenhof Hotel welcomes guests with great services and home-like atmosphere. The 58 spacious, comfortable rooms, decorated in shades of green and garden motifs will make your stay extremely relaxing.

The Cacica salt mine represents an important tourist attraction of the region. Cacica Salt Mine is one of the oldest exploitations of salt recrystallized from brine from Europe.This is great place to spent a few days in relaxation and cure at the salt mine which treats a lot of pulmonary and rheumatism diseases.
18 km away from Gura Humorului, near Cacica Town.

Cetatea de Scaun a Sucevei is a medieval fortress located in city of Suceava, Suceava County. It was built in 14th century during Petru I Muşat\'s reign and expanded in the 15th century during Stefan the Great III\'s reign. The citadel played a key role in Stefan the Great III of Modavia\'s defense system.

The music fans can enter the universe in which the biggest composer of Bucovina has lived. The Memorial House in which the founder of the Romanian modern music has lived, is impressive not only for its oldness but for its historical importance and architectonic style.

The Putna Monastery is one of the most important cultural, religious and artistic centers established in medieval Moldavia. The Putna Monastery houses the tombs of Stefan the Great —nowadays, a place of pilgrimage —, and several of his family members. The icon veils and tombstones are held as fine examples of Moldavian art in Stefan the Great’s time.

Sucevita Monastery is an Eastern Orthodox convent built in 1585 by Ieremia Movilă, Gheorghe Movilă and Simion Movilă. This classic Moldavian church with its five rooms, shows the first new architectural tendencies: smaller niches, and three bases for the tower. The frescoes are very remarkable, colourful and well preserved.
Sucevita Village, 18 km away from the city of Rădăuţi.

The Church of St. George of the Voronet Monastery is possibly the most famous church of Romania. Often known as the "Sistine Chapel of the East", the frescoes at Voroneț feature an intense shade of blue known in Romania as "Voroneț blue".
6 km from Voroneț Village, Gura Humorului, Suceava County

Iulius Mall Suceava revolutionizes the retail market through regional mix of shopping -dining -entertainment. The modern architecture and design added the 150 quality brands, are recommending Iulius Mall Suceava as a top destination for shopping and entertainment with style.

What\'s the results when you combine the sweet Moldavian mouth and the Metro professionalism? A warm and familiar shop, in which the customer likes to come, and receives solutions from the Metro team, adapted to his needs.

On Bucovina lands, Galleria Suceava aims to combine traditions with good humour, entertainment with relaxation. Galleria Suceava offers its customers a new shopping concept, a mall completely devoted to them, defined by new brands, useful services, plenty of music and fun.

Carrefour...Suceava...Bucovina...three words that, taken together, symbolizes tradition, variety, innovation and perspective. Carrefour Suceava group promotes values, such as low prices, quality, freshness, variety, innovation and service.
You have no entries yet in your journal. Make some memories!
